scripts.cdk:diff: BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current) && cdk diff --profile website branchName=$BRANCH -c environment=dev
scripts.deploy:stack: BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current) && cdk deploy --all --profile website -c branchName=$BRANCH -c environment=dev
scripts.destroy:stack: BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current) && cdk destroy --all --profile website -c branchName=$BRANCH -c environment=dev
scripts.bootstrap:stack: BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current) && cdk bootstrap --profile website --require-approval never -c branchName=$BRANCH -c environment=dev
scripts.deploy:website: npm run describe:stack && lerna run deploy:code --scope @cladea.io/website --stream
scripts.bootstrap:lerna: npm i; lerna bootstrap; npm run build
